arts.ttl: Colombia accuse Bolivia of spying ahead of WCQ
arts.sum: Colombia national team head coach Nestor Lorenzo has accused Bolivia of spying on his side ahead of the 2026 World Cup qualifying match on Thursday at Municipal Stadium El Alto.

arts.ttl: When is Bolivia vs Colombia? Times, how to watch on TV, stream online
arts.sum: The CONMEBOL World Cup 2026 qualifier between Bolivia and Colombia will be played on Thursday, October 10, with kick-off at 4:00 p.m. ET / 1:00 p.m. PT . Watch Bolivia vs Colombia on Fanatiz .
